The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. John Durley, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 54295;First DistrictMay 10, 1971.Gerald W. Getty, Public Defender, of Chicago, (Alan Osheff, James N. Gramenos, and James J. Doherty, Assistant Public Defenders, of counsel,) for appellant.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. Novelle and George Pappas, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel,) for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE GOLDBERG.
